One of my favorite musicians had his birthday tonight( last night if your being technical) at the infamous BEDLAM down town. I got there late ( after 1am, hey I’m an artist, I own the night!!!) but Javier was still plucking away on his guitar with friends and making beautiful music. He has a band called the “Sunshine Boys” check ‘em out! There was , despite the late hour, still a happy group of revilers, including one Danielle, piercing eyes mixed with lovely piercings and great conversation. Think of vanilla ice cream mixed with hot sauces, add a healthy dollop of brains and there you go. Also ran into Steve and Marine, his band “Wives and Lovers” will be @ The Big Foot Lodge Wed. Aug. 18th, well worth a look, they looked lovely as always and it was great talking with them. I’ve been hermit boy( for various reasons) so it was very refreshing to get out in this dirty little town and have a nice time. So happy birthday, Javier, and many happy returns!!! now I'm back home with Kwi my cat and my cocktail. cheers!

having one of those months, the kind when you remind yourself its good to be here . My " big FOUR O" is the 31st of this month. That three year old little kid drawing all over the walls with cray0ns is still trying to work his magic. I want to have some kind of wild celebration and surround my self with friends and stand up to shout" I'm still here, motherfuckers!!!". Have recently been having a hard time painting( ohhhh, poor me...) but am getting myself geared up again. On October 1st I'm in a West Memphis Three fund raiser show in Phx AZ . I'll post all the details as I get them, its a great cause. I was in a fund raiser for them at sixspace gallery( http://www.sixspace.com/gallery/wm3/), called “ Cruel And Unusual a Benefit Exhibition for the West Memphis Three" with Chad Robertson(http://www.chadrobertson.com/) great fucking artist who was at Otis with me , Exene Cervenka, The Clayton Brothers, Edward Colver, Glen E. Friedman, Camille Rose Garcia, Shepard Fairey, Jaime Hernandez, Matt Mahurin, Marilyn Manson, Liz McGrath, Grove Pashley, Raymond Pettibon, , Floria Sigismondi.Winonna Rider and Jello Biafra both spoke to the crowd of over three thousand. It was a wonderful experience. That’s it for now, keep painting emmmeric
